summary.span: 提供允许应用程序读写 XPS 文档组件的类型。

span.span: Provides types that allow applications to read and write the components of an XPS document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了表示 XML 纸张规范的主要部分的接口和类型 (XPS) 文档，该 命名空间还提供对打包过程的控制，包括数字签名和 XPS 文档 (DRM) 的 Rights Management 数字签名。In addition to the interfaces and the types that represent the major parts of an XML Paper Specification (XPS) document, the namespace provides control over the packaging process, including digital signatures and Digital Rights Management (DRM) of XPS documents. 有关详细信息，请参阅 XML 纸张规格 (XPS) 可供下载 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) 。For more information, see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

related.span: 开放打包约定的数字签名框架

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions
